channel.title: Livermore Marathi Mandal
channel.description: Recent content on Livermore Marathi Mandal

item.title: About-Us
item.description: We are a community of Marathi speaking people in Livermore, CA. The intent of this community is to get together, share and celebrate the rich Marathi heritage.

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: Question 1: How to connect with the Livermore Marathi Mandal? Answer: Email the coordinators at: Question 2: Is their any enrollment fees? Answer: No, its absolutely free though we do accept donations during events. Question 3: How to volunteer? Answer: Please contact the coordinators at:
